meta.job_title: NDT Level II Eddy Current Technician

skills.skill: Nondestructive Testing (NDT) Equipment Setup and Calibration
Technical Background in NDT Methods and Procedures

duties_responsibilities.duty: Set up and calibrate nondestructive testing equipment
Conduct tests to ensure quality and detect discontinuities using NDT methods of inspection
Interpret radiographs, cathode ray tube (CRT) or digital readouts, conductivity meters and visual indicators

education_certification.credential: Certified Level II Eddy Current Technician
